caption.p: Effect of treatment with compound 17, 25, and 26 at three different doses (0.25 µM, 5 µM, and 10 µM) on cleavage of caspase 3, 8, and 9 and PARP. Increased expression of gamma H2AX, a phosporylated form of H2AX, indicates increased DNA double strand fragmentation of A549 cells treated for 48 h in a dose- dependent manner.
